name: Arena Knight
description:
My third solo-dev game. Thanks for playing.

 Leave a comment, tell me what you liked and didn't like.

 ALSO selling some of the sprites seen in the game on my main itch.io page

Controls

Movement -  arrow keys 

Light attack - Z

Heavy attack - X

Spin atk - hold C

Pause - P

Cheats 

HIT H - to increase hp to 1000 (no turning back from this, you'll have to refresh to go back to normal)

HIT R - when not in shop to restart tier with full hp
